slashCommands.name: edit
slashCommands.description: Edit code in the current file

customCommands.name: test
customCommands.prompt: Write unit tests for the highlighted code using pytest. Follow the patterns in the tests/ directory.

customCommands.name: docs
customCommands.prompt: Generate comprehensive documentation for this code following the style in docs/. Include examples and explain the architecture.

customCommands.name: review
customCommands.prompt:
Review this code for:
- Bugs and edge cases
- Performance issues
- Code style and best practices
- Type hints and documentation
Provide specific, actionable feedback.

customCommands.name: plugin
customCommands.prompt: Help me create a plugin following the PLUGIN_SPEC.md. Generate the boilerplate and explain how to implement the required interfaces.
